name: Rotom
author: Masakazu Fukuda
flavor_text: Its electric-like body can enter some kinds of machines and take control in order to make mischief.

poke_power.name: Type Shift
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Rotom’s type is {P} until the end of your turn.

attacks.name: Poltergeist
attacks.effect: Look at your opponent’s hand. This attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium card in your opponent’s hand.
